name: Rhythm Paradise
description:
This is a small rhythm game That I'm developing using the DFJK keys, and also sometimes even the SDF and JKL keys. It's fairly easy and for more chill players.

I still have a lot of work to do, and I'm held back by my current inability to code.

Make sure to check in on my project every once in a while to see If the game's been updated, because I will be adding more songs, and hopefully custom levels at some point.
